page.title: 14ECOLOGY
page.content: ECOLOGY Climate: the climate of this block can be described as mild for it does not experience any real extremes. Summer temperatures are about 16C and those in winter about 2C. Precipitation is moderate averaging about 750mm per year. The incidence of frost is related to altitude and the first frosts may be experienced about the middle of October and the last Spring frost about the beginning of May.Sring tends to be the driest part of the year while Summer and early Autumn are the wettest. Flora and Flora:this area has been occupied by man for many centuries with the result that,because of his activities,little of the natural environment and vegetation remains.
